availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Erwin (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer and town marshal)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer and town marshal. Kentucky native. Filed a marriage bond to Mary Ellen Stewart Erwin in Hickman County, Kentucky, on July 27, 1849. Father of Josephine Erwin and William W. Erwin. Farmer in Hickman County in 1850. Town marshal in Columbus in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 28A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus, p. 478.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hickman County Marriages, Film #005552774, p. 146.
